channel.title: package on Cloud Native
channel.description: Recent content in package on Cloud Native

item.title: Helm
item.description: Helm Use 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # valueshello:world# template{{.Values.hello | title }}# outputhello:World # 开头首字母大写 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # valueshello:world# template{{.Values.hello | upper }}# outputhello:WORLD # 全部大写 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # valueshello:world# template{{.Values.hello | quote }}# outputhello:"world"# 附加双引号 1 2 3 4 5
